trans-unit.source: Stop the timer and clear the time
trans-unit.target: Zaustavite mjerač vremena i postavite novo vrijeme

trans-unit.note: The sound is already downloaded
Going back to the previous page
The sound can be downloaded
List of sounds
Sound is paused
Sound is playing
Remove a sound from the list of active playing sounds. The parameter is the name of the sound to remove.

trans-unit.source: This will enable sound gallery sync across your devices.
trans-unit.target: Ovo će omogučiti sinkronizaciju vaše galerije zvukova na svim uređajima. Možete spremati zvukove prema svim vašim uređajima.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
Text for a button that will refresh a list with new data

trans-unit.source: Thank you for trying Ambie. For the best experience, try pinning us to your taskbar! Enjoy your relaxing stay 🏝
trans-unit.target: Hvala vam što koristite Ambie. Za najbolje iskustvo prikvačite aplikaciju na startnu traku! Uživajte u slušanju 🏝

trans-unit.source: Mix and match up to 3 sounds

trans-unit.note: Price per month, where the parameter {0} is a price like $1.00.
Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
Thank you message shown after user purchases a subscription.

trans-unit.source: Enjoying Ambie? Please consider rating us!
trans-unit.target: Uživaš u Ambieju? Razmislite o tome da nas ocijenite!
Automatski nastavi kada se Otvori Ambie

trans-unit.source: We need to download some sounds in order to play this. Once downloaded, try playing this again. Start download?
trans-unit.target: Moramo skinuti neke zvukove da bi ovo odsvirali. Nakon preuzimanja pokušajte ovo ponovno reproducirati. Želite li započeti preuzimanje?

trans-unit.source: You can jot down any notes here 🙂
Show me how to use it
This is an interval timer inspired by the pomodoro technique. The goal is to focus on a task for an extended period of time, then take a shorter rest break. Repeat this cycle to keep focusing!
trans-unit.target: Ovo je intervalni tajmer inspiriran pomodoro tehnikom. Cilj je usredotočiti se na zadatak dulje vrijeme, a zatim uzeti kraću pauzu za odmor. Ponovite ovaj ciklus kako biste se nastavili fokusirati!

trans-unit.source: Each cycle has a focus segment and a rest segment. Choose how long each focus segment will be. We recommend 25 minutes to start!
trans-unit.target: Svaki ciklus ima segment fokusa i segment odmora. Odaberite koliko će trajati svaki segment fokusa. Preporučujemo 25 minuta za početak!

trans-unit.source: Each focus and rest cycle can repeat multiple times. Try adding 1 repeat!
trans-unit.target: Svaki fokus i ciklus odmora mogu se ponoviti više puta. Pokušajte dodati 1 ponovite!

trans-unit.source: Now, choose how long each rest segment will be. We recommend about 5 minutes for now!
trans-unit.target: Sada odaberite koliko će trajati svaki segment odmora. Za sada preporučujemo oko 5 minuta!

trans-unit.source: Start the timer and work on your tasks. We'll send you notifications when it's time to rest. Work hard!
trans-unit.target: Pokrenite mjerač vremena i radite na svojim zadacima. Poslat ćemo vam obavijesti kada dođe vrijeme za odmor.
{0} minutama fokusa, {1} minutama odmora, ponavlja se {2}.

trans-unit.source: Your recent history will appear here
trans-unit.target: Vaša nedavna povijest pojavit će se ovdje

trans-unit.source: Were you interrupted by something? Keep track of your interruptions here, so you can review them later in your history.
trans-unit.target: Je li vas nešto prekinulo? Ovdje pratite svoje prekide kako biste ih mogli pregledati kasnije u svojoj povijesti.

trans-unit.source: Add tasks to focus on, then press the start button
trans-unit.target: Dodavanje zadataka na koje ćete se usredotočiti, a zatim pritisnite gumb Start

trans-unit.source: With Ambie Mini, we'll shrink the window and display only the necessary items to help you focus.
trans-unit.target: Uz Ambie Mini smanjit ćemo prozor i prikazati samo potrebne stavke koje će vam pomoći da se usredotočite.

trans-unit.source: Drag and drop sounds to personalize your home page. Try it now!
trans-unit.target: Povucite i ispustite zvukove da biste personalizirali početnu stranicu. Probajte odmah!

trans-unit.source: Sorry about that! We couldn't load the catalogue. Try checking your internet connection.
trans-unit.target: Žao mi je zbog toga! Nismo mogli učitati katalog. Pokušajte provjeriti internetsku vezu.

trans-unit.source: Ambie Mini will open automatically when focusing
trans-unit.target: Ambie Mini će se automatski otvoriti prilikom fokusiranja

trans-unit.source: We'll notify you know when new sounds are available
trans-unit.target: Obavijestit ćemo vas kada su dostupni novi zvukovi

trans-unit.source: On launch, Ambie will resume playing automatically
trans-unit.target: Prilikom lansiranja Ambie će nastaviti s automatskom reprodukcijom

trans-unit.source: Crashes and anonymous usage info are reported to help improve Ambie
trans-unit.target: Prijavljuju se padovi i anonimni podaci o korištenju koji pomažu u poboljšanju Ambieja

trans-unit.source: Change the colours that appear in Ambie
trans-unit.target: Promjena boja koje se pojavljuju u Ambieju

trans-unit.source: Let's see if they can be downloaded.
trans-unit.target: Da vidimo mogu li se preuzeti.

trans-unit.source: Check here for updates to your sounds and videos.
trans-unit.target: Ovdje potražite ažuriranja svojih zvukova i videozapisa.

trans-unit.source: Updates contain improvements to translations, sound quality, and more.
trans-unit.target: Ažuriranja sadrže poboljšanja prijevoda, kvalitetu zvuka i još mnogo toga.

trans-unit.source: Improves playback quality, translations, and other metadata
trans-unit.target: Poboljšava kvalitetu reprodukcije, prijevode i druge metapodatke

trans-unit.source: Is there anything we can learn to avoid future interruptions?
trans-unit.target: Možemo li išta naučiti kako bismo izbjegli buduće prekide?

trans-unit.source: Sounds will continue to play after your focus session ends
trans-unit.target: Zvukovi će se nastaviti reproducirati nakon završetka sesije fokusa

trans-unit.source: Oops! We couldn't find that sound. We'll see if we can add it in the future
trans-unit.target: Ups! Nismo mogli naći taj zvuk. Vidjet ćemo možemo li ga dodati u budućnosti

trans-unit.source: Resume your last ambience with one click when your PC starts up
trans-unit.target: Nastavite svoj posljednji ambijent jednim klikom kada se PC pokrene

trans-unit.source: Get more sounds from the catalogue

trans-unit.note: A portion of a phrase that looks like '5-day streak'

trans-unit.source: Listening daily grows your streak, but skipping a day resets it!
trans-unit.target: Svakodnevno slušanje povećava vaš niz, ali preskakanje dana ga resetira!

trans-unit.source: Receive reminders to help keep your daily streak active
trans-unit.target: Primajte podsjetnike koji će vam pomoći da vaš dnevni niz ostane aktivan

trans-unit.source: Your background is currently disabled to help you save battery!
trans-unit.target: Pozadina je trenutno onemogućena kako bi vam pomogla uštedjeti bateriju!

trans-unit.source: Access the built-in catalogue of sounds. Download your next favourite music here.
trans-unit.target: Pristupite ugrađenom katalogu zvukova. Preuzmite svoju sljedeću omiljenu glazbu ovdje.

trans-unit.source: Are you working or studying? Use our innovative focus timer to help you be productive.
trans-unit.target: Radiš li ili učiš? Koristite naš inovativni mjerač vremena fokusa koji će vam pomoći da budete produktivni.

trans-unit.source: View the sounds you have installed, play up to 3 sounds, and find your favourite combination.
trans-unit.target: Pogledajte zvukove koje ste instalirali, reproducirajte do 3 zvuka i pronađite svoju omiljenu kombinaciju.

trans-unit.source: Use our meditation guides to help you relax or to calm your nerves.
trans-unit.target: Koristite naše vodiče za meditaciju koji će vam pomoći da se opustite ili smirite živce.

trans-unit.source: Check here occasionally for updates to the sounds you have installed.
trans-unit.target: Ovdje povremeno potražite ažuriranja zvukova koje ste instalirali.

trans-unit.source: There's a new update available! Restart now to apply the update.
trans-unit.target: Dostupno je novo ažuriranje! Odmah ponovno pokrenite računalo da biste primijenili ažuriranje.

trans-unit.source: Ambie will pause when the timer ends
trans-unit.target: Ambie će pauzirati kada tajmer završi

trans-unit.source: Downloading your video. We'll be ready soon.
trans-unit.target: Preuzimanje videozapisa. Uskoro ćemo biti spremni.

trans-unit.note: E.g. 1 week free, then $1.49/month

trans-unit.source: Contact us if you have feedback, questions, or issues
trans-unit.target: Obratite nam se ako imate povratne informacije, pitanja ili probleme

trans-unit.source: Claim your free 7 days of Ambie+
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
